name: us-soccer-calendars
description: iCal files for the 2026 MLS season

scripts.build: vite build && cp -r public/mls build/ && cp -r public/wc26 build/
scripts.generate: npm run generate-mls && npm run generate-wc26
scripts.generate-and-build: npm run generate-mls && npm run generate-wc26 && npm run build
